0.text: Passive - Doom: Periodically, Vex empowers her next basic ability to  knock down and  fear enemies hit for 0.75 / 1 / 1.25 / 1.5 (based on level) seconds, during which they are  slowed by 60% − 99% (based on distance from Vex). If  Looming Darkness triggers Doom, enemies hit will  flee from the epicenter instead.Doom's cooldown  resets upon respawning.

1.text: Innate - Gloom: Nearby enemy  champions and  monsters that  dash or  blink will be marked with Gloom for 6 seconds. Vex's next basic attack or basic ability hit will detonate the mark, the basic attack becoming  non-projectile.  Looming Darkness will also inflict Gloom, but cannot detonate it.

2.text: Gloom's detonation deals 30 − 140 (based on level) (+ 20% AP)  bonus magic damage and  refunds 25% of Doom's cooldown. Against  monsters, this instead deals 40 / 45 / 50 / 55 / 60% (based on level) damage and  refunds 10% of Doom's cooldown.

0.text: Active: Vex launches a wave of mist in the target direction that deals magic damage to enemies hit. After travelling 500 units, the wave accelerates but also narrows itself.
Active: Vex emits a shockwave around her before the cast time, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies and  shielding herself for 2.5 seconds.
Active: Vex tosses her Shadow to explode at the target location, dealing magic damage and  slowing enemies hit for 2 seconds. The explosion widens based on cast distance.

1.text: Looming Darkness will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

0.text: Active: Vex sends her Shadow in the target direction that grants  sight around its trajectory and deals magic damage to enemies hit.

1.text: Shadow stops upon hitting an enemy  champion, marking and  revealing them for 4 seconds. Shadow Surge can be recast while the target is marked.

2.text: Recast: Vex  dashes towards the marked target with  displacement immunity. Upon arrival, the mark is consumed to deal magic damage.

3.text: If the target dies within 6 seconds of being marked, Vex can cast Shadow Surge again within 12 seconds at no cost after 0.5 seconds.
